title: first
contents:
mode_edit code
API / rxjs/index

firstlink

仅发送源 Observable 发送的第一个值（或满足某些条件的第一个值）。

Emits only the first value (or the first value that meets some condition) emitted by the source Observable.

仅发送第一个值或能通过某些测试的第一个值。

Emits only the first value. Or emits only the first value that passes some test.

如果不带参数调用，first 就会发送源 Observable 的第一个值，然后完成。如果调用时带有 predicate 函数，则 first 会发送与指定条件匹配的源的第一个值。如果未提供 defaultValue 且未找到匹配元素，则会引发错误。

If called with no arguments, first emits the first value of the source Observable, then completes. If called with a predicate function, first emits the first value of the source that matches the specified condition. Throws an error if defaultValue was not provided and a matching element is not found.

例子link

Exampleslink

仅发送在 DOM 上发生的第一次点击

Emit only the first click that happens on the DOM

import { fromEvent, first } from 'rxjs'; const clicks = fromEvent(document, 'click'); const result = clicks.pipe(first()); result.subscribe(x => console.log(x));

发送在 DIV 上发生的第一次点击

Emits the first click that happens on a DIV

import { fromEvent, first } from 'rxjs'; const div = document.createElement('div'); div.style.cssText = 'width: 200px; height: 200px; background: #09c;'; document.body.appendChild(div); const clicks = fromEvent(document, 'click'); const result = clicks.pipe(first(ev => (<HTMLElement>ev.target).tagName === 'DIV')); result.subscribe(x => console.log(x));

first<T, D>(predicate?: (value: T, index: number, source: Observable<T>) => boolean, defaultValue?: D): OperatorFunction<T, T | D>

参数

predicate (value: T, index: number, source: Observable<T>) => boolean

可选。默认值为 undefined。

一个可选函数，用于针对每个条目进行调用，以测试条件是否匹配。

An optional function called with each item to test for condition matching.
defaultValue D

可选。默认值为 undefined。

如果在源上找不到有效值，则发出此默认值。

The default value emitted in case no valid value was found on the source.

返回值

一个返回 Observable 的函数，该 Observable 会发送满足此条件的第一个条目。

OperatorFunction<T, T | D>: A function that returns an Observable that emits the first item that matches the condition.

异常

如果此 Observable 在发送任何 next 通知之前就已完成，则将 EmptyError 传给 Observer 的 error 回调。这就是 first() 与 take(1) 的不同之处，后者会直接完成。

EmptyError Delivers an EmptyError to the Observer's error callback if the Observable completes before any next notification was sent. This is how first() is different from take(1) which completes instead.

重载形式link

first(predicate?: null, defaultValue?: D): OperatorFunction<T, T | D>

参数

可选。默认值为 undefined。
defaultValue D

可选。默认值为 undefined。

返回值

参数

defaultValue S

返回值

OperatorFunction<T, S>

defaultValue D

参数

predicate (value: T, index: number, source: Observable<T>) => boolean
defaultValue D

可选。默认值为 undefined。

OperatorFunction<T, T | D>
